nodes.text: Quick Locations is a web enhancement published by Wizards of the Coast for Galactic Campaign Guide. It was written by Peter Schweighofer and J.D. Wiker and published on August 14, 2003.

This web enhancement is designed to give gamemasters generic locations that can be quickly added to an adventure, providing descriptions, special game rules, and adventure hooks for locations from alleyways to urban promenades.
